io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.events

Interface NucleusMailEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, Event

    @MightOccurAsync
public interface NucleusMailEvent
extends Event, Cancellable
    An event that is posted when a player uses /mail in NucleusPlugin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMessage()
      The message that was sent.
      User getRecipient()
      The recipient of the mail.
      Optional<User> getSender()
      The sender of the mail.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Event

        getCause, getContext, getSource

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Cancellable

        isCancelled, setCancelled

    • Method Detail

      • getSender

        Optional<User> getSender()
        The sender of the mail. If Optional.empty(), this means it was some server process.
        Returns:
        The sender

      • getRecipient

        User getRecipient()
        The recipient of the mail.
        Returns:
        The recipient.

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()
        The message that was sent.
        Returns:
        The message.
